data: PED PLASURG Cranial and Non-Cranial Distractor Orders (Module)

Site: Cranial Distractors, Change dressing PRN, Reinforce PRN, Cleansing instructions: Use half water and half peroxide, and clean with a q-tip to remove all the old polysporin. Then place new polysporin
QID, Clean and turn in morning, only clean at noon, clean and turn in evening and only clean at night
Site: Distractors, Change dressing PRN, Reinforce PRN, Cleansing instructions: Use half water and half peroxide, and clean with a q-tip to remove all the old polysporin. Then place new polysporin
QID, Turning Plan: One full turn 4 times per day (0800, 1400, 2000, 0200). 1 full turn = 0.5mm
